authorships.raw_affiliation_string: Johnson Singh Chandam is a postgraduate (MA) student in International Relations (Global Studies), from the University of Wroclaw, Poland, and is now a doctoral student in the University of Warsaw. His primary research interests are in areas of liberal international order, great power politics, democracy, inequality and poverty.
